Phrase: According to Miyako and Yoshino, who returned alive from the different space created by the curse, the unexplained phenomena that happened to Yoshino were caused by the sorcerer who cast the curse, and that sorcerer is not related to the doll in Yoshino's hands.
However, this is under the assumption that everything the fox-faced girl is saying is true. If that girl is our collaborator or in a position of mutual interest, then we can trust what she says.

Above all, we cannot overlook what she said about the Guardian of the Giant Tree. It is unclear what effect the black doll in Yoshino's hand has, but if it is related to the Guardian of the Giant Tree, then we can't let it go.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: From what I have observed, that black doll is no mere doll. It is an instrument of sorcery, created with a purpose from the beginning. It also has a power that I cannot control. I think an expert should take a look at it at least once...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Even if you claim you are not an expert, I can't think of anyone else other than Miss Miyako who knows more about it.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Simoamazu is also a doll otaku sorceress, but she's more of an expert on sorcery than on dolls. Miyako seems to know more about dolls.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Miyako is a doll master's apprentice after all.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's not all. Miyako has doll friends. She can even talk to her dolls.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Someone who can talk to dolls...

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Hello Vivi. It's another beautiful day here, isn't it?

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Yes it is, Bourse. On a day like this, I wish we could comb each other's hair in the basement where the sun doesn't shine.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Geez, Vivi, you just want to stroke Le Bourse's head, don't you?

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Aha, you got me? Bourse's drill hair drills through my heart...

Name: Bourse
Phrase: ...That's why I came here today to buy a hair ornament for mon petit Vivi.

Name: Putra
Phrase: No, Bourse can't do that.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Not Bourse.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Definitely not Miss Bourse.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Poor Bourse...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Bourse speaks to herself after all. But Miyako is different. She really hears the doll's voice.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: But I can't hear her voice. She doesn't respond to people's voices or hearts. She's more like a magical tool than a doll...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's a doll because it has the shape of a person. Whether you call them magical tools, artifacts, or toys is up to you.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yoshino-chan...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Somewhere in your heart, you can hear such a voice. Maybe that's what this girl is saying.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I don't know if it's a good thing or a bad thing, but that doll is definitely an important clue.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Miyako's theory seems on the money that there is something that tried to kidnap the children and a thing that tried to protect them, respectively.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: She will lead us to the person who put the curse on Miss Yoshino. That's what the girl said, right?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yes. That's exactly what she said. She was also the one who tried to utilise Yoshino's power.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Somehow, the background to the incident is becoming clear. It means that there are both enemies and allies in this Senbon Torii. The girl with the fox mask is probably our ally.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: If she were an enemy, we would be completely out.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: But if she's an ally, we're close to the finish line.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's the summit.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Now if only we could find that thing called the black torii...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Paddington!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Aye! It's Paddington popping up at the call!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Have you seen the black torii?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: No! I haven't seen any!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yes, thank you very much.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: However! I have one important thing to report here!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Really? If it's a stupid report, I'll whip your ass, got it?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, if you do that, my butt will split in four! Though that depends on the angle of the whip!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: However! That's not going to happen! Leave everything to me.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Just get to the point already.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Actually, we've never been through this place before!

Name: Putra
Phrase: We've never been through here before?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Yes. From first glance, this place looks like a place we have explored before we took refuge in Miyako's barrier, however the number of torii gates and the spacing between them are slightly different.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Amazing...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I've never seen anyone try to whip Miko-sama before...

Name: Putra
Phrase: Really now!? She must have something more amazing for you to be surprised!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I'm sorry. I'm just speechless with amazement.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: This part of the maze is the first time we've reached. We've looped around the same places before, but never in the same order or in the same size.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So the summit is close.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: But I just can't find the black torii. To find it, we have to go through this maze again...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: ...We may not have to.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yoshino?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Look. Yoshino didn't do anything, but the doll is moving.

Name: Putra
Phrase: It's true. She's trying to turn her face somewhere!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yoshino-chan, put the doll on your palm.
As Miyako instructed, Yoshino put the black fox-faced doll on her palm. The doll then moved its entire body to indicate a certain direction.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Turn your body around in place.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Like this?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: More. You can even turn around and face the other way.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Turn around the other way...
With the doll in her palm, Yoshino turned around and changed direction. Then, to our surprise, the doll also moved its body and turned back around to face the original direction.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: There is something over here. She's trying to tell us something.

Name: Putra
Phrase: But there's no path in the direction the doll is facing, right? Does that mean we have to jump down the cliff?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That's a possibility. I'll go and have a look.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Whoa! Wait, wait! Let's calm down, shall we? It'll be too late later to say 'I knew it was wrong'!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: This is not a directional signal. I think she means she wants us to look here...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: You know what they say, 'Crisis in the forest of trees.'

Name: Putra
Phrase: It's 'Can't see the forest for the trees'.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Looking nearby at... the torii pillar?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's like what this girl here's looking at. Let's investigate it a little.
The doll's gaze was on a pillar of a torii gate. At first glance, it appeared to be an ordinary red pillar, but when Yoshino approached it and released her magic power...
...A sign written in black characters appeared on the pillar of the torii gate.
This is - a torii.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: It's a black torii...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: A black torii was hidden in the pillar of the red torii.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: If we follow the path marked with the black torii gate, we can reach the summit. She was telling the truth.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: We can see it now. Maybe we can reach the summit before dawn.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Let's get to the top of the mountain and beat up the bugger who put the curse on Yoshino.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino's also curious about what she said about 'saving oka-san'.
